subject: Skiing
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: Kikkan Randall has thrown open the doors on Alaskan cross-country skiing just as one of her heroes, Steve Prefontaine, awakened the country to Oregon’s running culture in the 1970s.
snippet: Kikkan Randall has thrown open the doors on Alaskan cross-country skiing just as one of her heroes, Steve Prefontaine, awakened the country to Oregon’s running culture in the 1970s.
